name: Mvcpluggedin
tagline: MvcPluggedIn extends the ASP.NET MVC/Web API framework with a dynamic plug-and-play system for developing new areas/modules. The framework incorporates aspects of Entity Framework Code First, Ninject, ELMAH, and the ArcGIS REST API.
body:
MvcPluggedIn
===========

MvcPluggedIn extends the ASP.NET MVC/Web API framework with a dynamic plug-and-play system for developing new areas/modules. The framework incorporates aspects of Entity Framework Code First, Ninject, ELMAH, and the ArcGIS REST API.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
